title: S4 Ep66: Two Truths and A Lie: Monday, April 12th, 2021
itunes:title: Two Truths and A Lie: Monday, April 12th, 2021
description:
• DMX, rapper and actor, dies at 50 (CNN)
  • Prince Harry Arrives in the U.K. Two Days After Grandfather Prince Philip's Death (PEOPLE)
  • Hideki Matsuyama Makes History as He Wins the 2021 Masters Tournament (PEOPLE)
  • 'Drivers License' Singer Olivia Rodrigo Gets Parking Ticket: Driving 'Isn't All Fun and Games' (PEOPLE)
  • Henry Cavill Goes Instagram Official with 'Beautiful and Brilliant' Girlfriend Natalie Viscuso (PEOPLE)
